metadata.description: Azure region where all resources will be deployed. This is distinct from resource group location.
Size of VMs in the VM Scale Set.
The Ubuntu version for the VM. This will pick a fully patched image of this given Ubuntu version. Allowed values are: 15.04, 14.04.2-LTS.
String used as a base for naming resources (9 characters or less). A hash is prepended to this string for some resources, and resource-specific information is appended.
Number of VM instances (100 or less).
Image for worker instances, captured at portal
Two letters for environment: de, li, etc...
